text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
A Triple Crown Champion has been born<n>today!
At long last, Narita Brian has<n>done it!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Brian! Brian! Brian! Brian!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmph.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The Kyoto Racecourse is roaring with a<n>chorus of
cheers for Brian!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
She's only gotten stronger and stronger<n>since the
Derby!

text_block_list.name: Photographer
text_block_list.text:
That's why they call her the Beast! ...Oh,<n>hey!
Look over here!

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
All at once, the press fix their cameras<n>on her, but
the Triple Crown Champion<n>has no complaints.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but the Kikuka Sho is only<n>finishing what
we started back at the<n>Satsuki Sho.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
This past year—no, since even before my<n>debut,
you've—

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Now, hooold on just a minute!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
This is no time to be wrappin' things up!<n>What are
you two thinkin'?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you, Amazon.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's right, it's me! Now, come over<n>here a sec,
would ya.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Let's have a quick talk.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Fine.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: All right, what is it?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So, I've left my mark on the Tiara Cup<n>and you've
won the Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You didn't come all this way just so we<n>could pat
each other on the back and<n>call it quits, didja?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Of course not. Not even the Triple<n>Crown is
enough to satisfy me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
If anything, you could say I'm even<n>hungrier. But
do you think you're the<n>prey that can satisfy me?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: ...Just try me. I'll smash you into dust!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Heh...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Trainer. Our next race is—

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...That's right.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: And that's where I'll fulfill my promise...
